author: Special Correspondent
text:
Senior leaders of Puducherry Pradesh Congress Committee (PPCC) are likely to apprise the AICC leadership of current political developments in the Union Territory on Thursday in New Delhi.

AICC general secretary and former Union Minister of State V.Narayanasamy, Leader of Opposition V.Vaithilingam and PPCC president A.Namassivayam also form the delegation which will meet Congress vice-president Rahul Gandhi and other leaders in New Delhi.

Strategy

According to sources, the leaders are likely to suggest a strategy on electoral alliances to face Assembly polls.
title: PPCC leaders likely to apprise AICC
